title: Privacy Policy
introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we handle your information when you use re-frame.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy:
points: We do not collect or store personal information
Anonymized conversation data may be saved to help us learn how to improve and make this app more helpful. No personally identifiable information (PII) is ever stored.
No user accounts or registration required

technicalData.title: Technical Data
technicalData.description: We may collect anonymous technical information to improve the service:
technicalData.note: This data cannot be used to identify you personally.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use minimal cookies for essential functionality:
cookies.control: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, though some features may not work properly.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.description: We use secure third-party services for core functionality:

services.name: Google Cloud
services.dataSharing: Temporary conversation data for processing only

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
points: Anonymized conversation data may be saved to help us learn how to improve and make this app more helpful. No personally identifiable information (PII) is ever stored.
Technical logs are maintained to help improve the platform's technical aspects.
No long-term storage of personal information

yourRights.title: Your Rights
points: Stop using the service at any time

security.title: Security
security.description: We implement security measures to protect your data:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify users of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page. The principle of privacy protection will not be affected by any changes.
